mapper.select: SELECT SEASON_KEY, ALPHA_DTTM, DATEDIFF(omega_dttm,now()) D_DAY, CHARITY_FEE, COJAM_FEE, CREATED_DTTM, CREATOR_FEE, CREATOR_PAY, DESCRIPTION, IS_ACTIVE, MINIMUM_PAY, OMEGA_DTTM, TITLE, MAXIMUM_PAY, TRANSFER_PAY FROM TB_SEASON WHERE IS_ACTIVE = true
SELECT CATEGORY_KEY, CATEGORY_NAME, ORDER_NUMBER FROM TB_SEASON_CATEGORY ORDER BY ORDER_NUMBER

SELECT S.SEASON_KEY, S.ALPHA_DTTM, S.CHARITY_FEE, S.COJAM_FEE, S.CREATED_DTTM, S.CREATOR_FEE, S.CREATOR_PAY, S.DESCRIPTION, S.IS_ACTIVE, S.MINIMUM_PAY, S.OMEGA_DTTM, S.TITLE, S.MAXIMUM_PAY, S.TRANSFER_PAY, CT.CT_JSON FROM TB_SEASON S ,( SELECT CM.SEASON_KEY ,CONCAT('[', GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT('{') ,CONCAT('"categoryKey":"',CM.CATEGORY_KEY,'"') ,CONCAT(',"categoryName":"',CT.CATEGORY_NAME,'"') ,CONCAT(',"limitation":"',CM.LIMITATION,'"') ,CONCAT('}',',') ORDER BY CT.ORDER_NUMBER) ,']') AS CT_JSON FROM TB_SEASON_CATEGORY_MAPPING CM ,TB_SEASON_CATEGORY CT WHERE CM.CATEGORY_KEY = CT.CATEGORY_KEY GROUP BY CM.SEASON_KEY ) CT WHERE S.SEASON_KEY = CT.SEASON_KEY ORDER BY is_active DESC , created_dttm DESC;

SELECT C.CATEGORY_KEY ,C.CATEGORY_NAME ,IFNULL(S.CNT,0) AS CNT ,TSCM.LIMITATION FROM TB_SEASON_CATEGORY C JOIN TB_SEASON_CATEGORY_MAPPING TSCM on C.CATEGORY_KEY = TSCM.CATEGORY_KEY AND TSCM.SEASON_KEY = #{seasonKey} LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SEASON_CATEGORY_KEY ,COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_QUEST WHERE SEASON_KEY = #{seasonKey} AND QUEST_STATUS IN ('SUCCESS','ONGONING','ADJOURN','APPROVE') AND PENDING = FALSE GROUP BY SEASON_CATEGORY_KEY ) S ON C.CATEGORY_KEY = S.SEASON_CATEGORY_KEY ORDER BY C.ORDER_NUMBER
